name: ChinaEU
goal:
ChinaEU is a business-led international association aimed at intensifying joint research and project-based business cooperation between China and Europe and fostering mutual investments in Internet, Telecom and Hi-tech sectors. ChinaEU provides an informal platform for constructive dialogue among industry leaders and top-level representatives of European Institutions and the Chinese Government.

ChinaEU aims at delivering tangible results in the following areas:
1. Bilateral arrangements for joint development and promotion of the next generation of mobile communication networks (5G);
2. Encouragement of Chinese investments in advanced European digital infrastructure and services, in tandem with the new EU Investment Plan of EUR 315bn targeting 21st Century strategic infrastructures;
3. Enhanced cooperation on Smart Cities, Smart Energy and Internet of Things;
4. Creation of a High Level Task Force to identify new concrete opportunities in E-commerce, On-line Services, Cloud Computing and Big Data;
5. Establishment of major investment funding and incentives focused on incubating hi-tech startups and collaborative innovation in China and in Europe.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Agreement between the European Union and China on 5G mobile technology

EU China year of tourism

Digital Single Market

EU-China Cooperation on Smart Cities

annual EU-China Summits
